txt.en: Talk to Múta in Tûr Fúar
Talk to Múta in the upper reaches of Tûr Fúar
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire can be found at Agal Dûn.\n\nYou should enter Tûr Fúar.
'Let us enter the Drearspire and find Ásachal and her devoted followers. There is not a moment to lose.'
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire can be found at Agal Dûn.\n\nYou should talk to Múta in Tûr Fúar.
Múta suggests pushing further into the Drearspire, for Brathar Crack-helm has been truthful in his word, thus far.

'Hold a moment, [placeholder]. This place is a labyrinth of stairways and halls that seemingly go nowhere! We must scale the tower together! Here is a horn. May you use it if we become separated.\n\n'The Dourhands said that while we should defeat as many cultists as we can, only a certain four would topple their hold in Tûr Fúar. High Priestess Ásachal is the obvious target, as is her second in command, Warlord Claghórd. We are also to target two powerful priestesses, Curcúan and Lasairë. Let us hope that we are able to find all four. For Gundabad!'
Talk to Múta inside the entrance of Tûr Fúar
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire can be found at Agal Dûn.\n\nYou should defeat Curcúan and Lasairë in Tûr Fúar.
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire can be found at Agal Dûn.\n\nYou should defeat Claghórd in Tûr Fúar.
'I did not come here to protect Ásachal from the likes of you.'
'I wanted to see what I would be up against after you toppled Ásachal's foolish plans.'
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire can be found at Agal Dûn.\n\nYou should defeat High Priestess Ásachal in Tûr Fúar.
'We have done it! There is only but one task at hand for us to accomplish. Meet me at the base of the stairs that lead to the very top of the Drearspire.'
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire can be found at Agal Dûn.\n\nYou should talk to Múta in Tûr Fúar.
The tower is like a vertical labyrinth!
'Do you think I would allow you to reach High Priestess Ásachal? If we must fight...'
'How dare you disturb our great work!'
'The High Priestess will be your doom!'
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire can be found at Agal Dûn.\n\nYou should talk to Múta in the upper reaches of Tûr Fúar.
'Now it is time to secure the powerful artifact the Dourhands speak of.'
'The High Priestess will know of this!'
'You are too late. My work is already complete here.'
'If you seek conquest, know that none will break the Iron Crown.'
